Articles.Content: May the fourth be with you.
and also revenge of the fifth?
I'm just depressed about Star Wars now. If George Lucas didn't kill it completely with the prequels, Disney will almost certainly finish the job.
I don't know, it seems like it will be an OK movie. Also, I always thought it should be revenge of the sixth. sounds much closer to sith than fifth.

Did you hear that Han SoloÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s famous ship is named after a bird expo that happens every 10 centuries called the Millennium Fowl Con. If you want to hang out I'll be in that starbucks they built underwater. IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢m an Ackbarista there.

As for one, this is my opinion on the internet today...

![nBDmTEk.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/nBDmTEk.jpg)
Wow, it's just like the new Battlefront: It's done a bit differently, so it's the worst ever. /sarcasm
I think there should be more names. 'Return of the Sixth' 'cause why not. And the 'Singalong of the Seventh' in honour of most people's reactions of the fate of LucasArts.
